mapper.insert: insert into auction values( auction_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{summary}, sysdate, #{addr}, #{stime}, #{etime}, #{type}, #{post}, #{addr2} )
mapper.select: select * from auction order by auction_no desc
mapper.update: update auction set name=#{name}, summary=#{summary}, addr=#{addr}, stime=#{stime}, etime=#{etime}, type=#{type}, post=#{post}, addr2=#{addr2} where auction_no=#{auction_no}
